TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SoapServerFormatterSink extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelSinkBase, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSink
type SoapServerFormatterSink = class interface IServerChannelSink interface IChannelSinkBase

summary.span: 提供使用 的伺服器格式子 (Formatter) 接收的實作。

span.span: Provides the implementation for a server formatter sink that uses the .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 從伺服器傳輸接收到的伺服器通道接收的要求資料流傳播，直到達到適當的格式器接收為止。The request stream propagates from the server transport sink through the server channel sinks until it reaches the appropriate formatter sink. 格式器接收會將訊息還原序列化，並將它傳遞管線。The formatter sink deserializes the message and passes it through the pipeline. 特殊的分派接收插入通道接收鏈結的結尾處方法，它會呼叫伺服器來建立伺服器通道接收鏈結的通道。A special dispatch sink is inserted at the end of the channel sink chain by method, which is called by server channels to create the server channel sink chains. 當訊息到達分派接收時，分派接收會將訊息傳遞到遠端基礎結構。When the message reaches the dispatch sink, the dispatch sink passes the message to the remoting infrastructure. |屬性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| |`includeVersions`|指定格式器是否將包含版本資訊。Specifies whether the formatter will include versioning information. 值為`true`或`false`。Values are `true` or `false`.| |`strictBinding`|指示接收格式器將會先嘗試使用完整的版本資訊 (如果有的話) 來辨識型別，然後才會使用不含版本資訊的型別名稱和組件名稱。Indicates that a receiving formatter will first try to identify the type using complete version information if it exists before using only the type name and assembly name without version information. 值為`true`或`false`。Values are `true` or `false`. 系統提供的兩個格式子預設都是 `false`。The default for both system-provided formatters is `false`.| |`typeFilterLevel`|字串值，指定自動還原序列化的層級的伺服器通道嘗試。A string value specifying the level of automatic deserialization a server channel attempts. 支援的值為`Low`（預設值） 和`Full`。Supported values are `Low` (the default) and `Full`. 如需有關還原序列化層級的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 遠端處理中的自動還原序列化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/5dxse167(v=vs.100))。For details about deserialization levels, see [Automatic Deserialization in .NET Framework Remoting](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/5dxse167(v=vs.100)).

只有.NET Framework 1.1 版下列平台上才支援這個屬性：Windows 98、 Windows NT 4.0、 Windows Millennium Edition、 Windows 2000，只有 Windows XP Home Edition、 Windows XP Professional 和 Windows Server 2003 系列。This property is supported only by the .NET Framework version 1.1 on the following platforms: Windows 98, Windows NT 4.0, Windows Millennium Edition, Windows 2000, Windows XP Home Edition, Windows XP Professional, and Windows Server 2003 family.| > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用此物件的執行個體，不受信任的資料，或透過不安全的通道會造成安全性風險。Using an instance of this object with untrusted data or across an unsecure channel is a security risk. 只能使用受信任的資料，並透過安全的通道，請使用此物件。Use this object only with trusted data and across a secure channel. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[資料驗證](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation).

span.span: Sinks and Sink Chains

related.span: .NET Framework 遠端處理中的自動還原序列化

span.span: Automatic Deserialization in .NET Framework Remoting

summary.span: 取得或設定 所執行之自動還原序列化 (Deserialization) 的 值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of automatic deserialization the performs.

value.span: ，表示目前的自動還原序列化層級。

span.span: The that represents the current automatic deserialization level.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支援的值為`Low`（預設值） 和`Full`。Supported values are `Low` (the default) and `Full`. 如需有關還原序列化層級的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET 遠端處理中的自動還原序列化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/5dxse167(v=vs.100))。For details about deserialization levels, see [Automatic Deserialization in .NET Remoting](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/5dxse167(v=vs.100)).
